REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0959 reute d f BC-ARMCO-<AS>-CHANGES-EU 03-02 0068

TEXT.TITLE: ARMCO <AS> CHANGES EUROPEAN MARKETING UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Armco Inc said its former European Steel Mill Merchandising department has become a unit of the parent's specialty steels division based in Butler. The unit, newly named Specialty Steels-Europe is based in Cologne, West Germany. It will market and sell in Europe the division's U.S.-made products and specialty products made in Europe. Reuter
